description.value: An extension to provide a textual description of the type of medication (including relevant properties of the composition and preparation method if possible), which is only used if no coded indication from the G Standard is available (historical data regarding magistral preparation which has been entered as free text instead of entering the substance codes).

purpose.value: This extension represents the Description concept of the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) PharmaceuticalProduct v2.1.2 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/PharmaceuticalProduct-v2.1.2(2020EN)), which is only used if no coded indication from the G Standard is available.
